name: Haispeed
description:
Try to collect as many coins as possible and get to first place on the leaderboard!

Controls:
A - paddle left
D - paddle right
If you press both, you can go straight forward!

So yes, everything works with just 2 buttons. That's because this game was developed in one week for the 2-Button game jam (https://itch.io/jam/2-buttons-jam-2022).

Created By:
InnDie Spieleentwicklung
Graphics: Marley, Maike
Music & SFX: Corinna
Programming: Tim, Lucas, Jonas
Level Design: Jonas
